title: Say What You Mean, Get What You Want: A Businessperson's Guide to Direct Communication
description: Product Description: Are you hesitant to speak up at work? Do people tune out when you talk? Are you afraid to say no? According to corporate consultant Judith Tingley, in order to get people to listen to what you say--and do what you want--assertive communication should be your goal. This book provides typical examples of workplace communications scenarios, plus self-tests to help assess present levels of directness.
author: Judith C. Tingley
